projects.name: Air CTRL - A SOTA Hand Gesture Recognition System
projects.description: I created an exciting real-time hand gesture recognition app that responds instantly to user movements. Using CNNs, MediaPipe, and OpenCV, I built a system that feels natural and responsive. I implemented the inference API in Flask and automated the training pipeline with Bash on Linux. Throughout the project, I used Jupyter notebooks to track experiments and document the development process.

projects.name: Deepfake Detection & Recognition System
projects.description: I developed an innovative hybrid Deepfake detection system that's currently patent-pending. What makes it special is a novel ASCII-based preprocessing technique that reduced computational load by an impressive 65%. I trained the model on extensive datasets from Kaggle, DFDC, and VGG16, then deployed it using Flask on AWS EC2 with Docker. The system uses Lambda for scalable inference and S3 for video data management. I've documented everything in Jupyter notebooks to ensure reproducibility and clarity.

projects.name: FairPlay - An Anti-Doping Education App
projects.description: I built a full-stack mobile application that makes anti-doping education engaging and accessible. Using React.js for the front end and Node.js/Express.js for the backend, I created a platform with personalized dashboards and real-time messaging. The app features a gamified experience with chat functionality, all built on a secure and scalable architecture that ensures smooth performance.
